page.title: 07THE MOTORWAY:-M27
page.content: This motorway was opened in 1984.Before it was built a selection of copses and plantations occupied the area, such as Rounds Copse,Long Copse, Westwood Copse and Kilndose plantation.There were also separate fields in which things like raspberries,potatoes and other kinds of vegetables were grown. A sign shows us that McAlpines built the motorway.It is a very busy road and has three lanes in each direction.In a period of 15 minutes we counted 250 vehicles going to Portsmouth and 599 coming from Portsmouth.These included 176 cars going to Portsmouth and 250 coming from Portsmouth.Altogether there were 166 lorries,52 vans,7 motorbikes,6 caravans,6 coaches,1 road cleaner,which we were very suprised to see,and 1 school bus.
